name: Mining Robot
description:
Control a little robot that have to mine as much as possible! Buy upgrades to be stronger.. and richer!

How to play (better on the Gamepad but available on the keyboard);

Gamepad:

Keyboard:

Grab Minecart : [Ctrl]

Mine/Interact: [Space]

Move : Arrow Keys

Start : Escape / Enter

Sauter : Upper Arrow Key

Contrôle du moteur : [A]/[D]

Music

Title:Otherworld

Artist:HeatleyBros

Writer:Brett Heatley, ASCAP

Publisher:Heatley Music Publishing, ASCAP

Label:Heatley Music Publishing
